lines.text: for i = 0 to 2 inclusive , read arr [ i ]
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i <= 2 ; i ++ ) { cin >> arr [ i ] ; }

lines.text: print absolute value of ( arr [ 0 ] - arr [ 1 ] ) + absolute value of ( arr [ 2 ] - arr [ 1 ] ) and newline
lines.code: cout << abs ( arr [ 0 ] - arr [ 1 ] ) + abs ( arr [ 2 ] - arr [ 1 ] ) << endl ;
